mapper.select: SELECT U.username, U.user_name, U.user_email, U.user_phone, I.image_path FROM user U LEFT JOIN image I ON U.username = I.username AND I.state = 0 WHERE U.username = #{username}

SELECT word_num, word_level, word_meaning, word_content, word_chinese, word_week, 'true' as word_favorite FROM word where word_num in (SELECT word_num FROM favorites where username = #{username} ORDER BY favorite_regdate)

SELECT str_num, username, str_answer_point, str_total_count, str_answer_count, str_inAnswer_count, str_time, str_type, created_at, COUNT(*) OVER() AS total_elements FROM short_test_result WHERE username = #{username} AND state = 0 ORDER BY str_num DESC limit #{size} offset #{offset}

SELECT ctr_num, ctr_answer_point, username, ctr_total_count, ctr_answer_count, ctr_inAnswer_count, ctr_time, created_at, COUNT(*) OVER() AS total_elements FROM choice_test_result WHERE username = #{username} AND state = 0 ORDER BY ctr_num DESC limit #{size} offset #{offset}

SELECT ctrd_num, word_num, ctrd_question_one, ctrd_question_two, ctrd_question_three, ctrd_question_four, ctrd_question_answer, ctrd_choice_num, ctrd_answer_content, ctrd_answer_meaning, ctrd_answer_chinese, ctrd_result, created_at FROM choice_test_result_detail WHERE ctr_num = #{ctrNum} AND state = 0 ORDER BY ctrd_num ASC

SELECT R.rd_num, R.record_num, R.username, R.word_num, R.rd_check, R.Record_value, W.word_level, W.word_meaning, W.word_content FROM record_detail R JOIN word W ON R.word_num = W.word_num WHERE username = #{username} AND record_num = #{recordNum} ORDER BY rd_num

update short_test_result set state = 1 where str_num = #{strNum} AND state = 0
